hero.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
hero.text: Hi, I'm Vamsi Javvadi. A passionate Full Stack Software Engineer with expertise in frontend, backend and AI technologies

about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.text: I love building scalable and efficient systems. I have experience in developing backend APIs, full stack applications, and contributing to AI projects. My skillset includes Java, Python, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Spring Boot, Django, and the list goes on. I thrive in solving complex problems and improving system performance.
about.subtitle: About Me

points: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop high-quality AI projects using RAG, Gemini, Next.js, and Pinecone.
Increased project efficiency by 30% and reduced deployment time by 25%.
Developed backend APIs with Django Rest Framework, containerized with Docker, and deployed on AWS ECS using Kubernetes.
Implemented Celery for real-time tasks, improving user experience by 35%.
Created a machine learning model for text extraction to retrieve student schedules and upload handwritten notes.
Developed and deployed 10+ microservices using Java SpringBoot with object-oriented design in an Agile environment.
Engineered full-stack web applications with React for frontend and Spring Boot for backend services.
Optimized SQL queries and redesigned relational database schemas in MySQL, enhancing data retrieval times by 30%.
Collaborated with senior colleagues to architect components for Spring Boot and React full stack applications.
Developed an intern allocation project using Golang and React, improving allocation efficiency by 30%.

degrees.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
